full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI BSNYEN YIG DNGOS GRUB SNYE MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(ZHES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI BSNYEN YIG DNGOS GRUB SNYE MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, CHOS LA BLO MIG RGYAS PA GU SHRI DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG RGYA MTSO DANG, RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA'I DGE SLONG 'ZOD PA @013B GNYIS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SNYOMS LAS PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB KYIS LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE'I BSNYEN YIG CHEN MOR GZHIR BYAS TE, SUM BHA MKHAN PO PAndI DZNY'A SHRI BHU TIS MDZAD PA'I CHOS SPYOD NOR BU'I 'PHRENG BA LAS BSNYEN SGRUB KYI SKABS SU DGOS PAR BSHAD PA 'GA' ZHIG BSNAN TE, RAB 'BYUNG 'DOD NANG GI LCAGS MO LUG LO'I MYUR ZHING BZANG PA RNAM BZHI'I GNYIS PA BYA'U ZLA BA'I YAR NGO, DGA' BA DANG PO, DBYANGS AA, GSAL BYED TA, ,KHAMS LA, 'DOD YON DRI, NA TSOD BYIS PA, GZA' SKAR BZANG BA'I NYIN MOR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD SHIN TU YANGS PA'I DGE BSGOS NGAG DBANG NOR BUS SO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA SHAR BTZONG KHA PA'I SNGAGS ZUNG 'BREL GYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
